title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 12 - released
description:
In this video we will have a look at the release notes of Sim Update 12 as well as the spot light event package which is now available for free containing the previous spotlight events. As you might have seen I have already recorded several videos which go through the detailed release notes of this update. If you didn't see them yet have a look at the video's listed below:

Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 12 - ready to be released
https://youtu.be/B7BGzR62Piw

Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 12 - new build available
https://youtu.be/HI3h9Wn5B2E

Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - H-4 Hercules spruce goose - using the autopilot
https://youtu.be/NtjUTK-265c

Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Grumman G-21 Goose - receives an EFB
https://youtu.be/vx0pjv0SxtY

Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 12 - new build available
https://youtu.be/LepcD964vao

Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - Sim Update 12 - new build available
https://youtu.be/AdFXnlNsxKQ
